verbs.description: DALLAS - With [ARG1: his dad] [V: scheduled] [ARG2: to speak at the 147th NRA convention shortly] , Donald Trump Jr. took some time to stroll through the exhibit hall . He 's friends with Hank Greenberg of Asheville , N.C .- based Marfione Custom Knives , so stopped by the booth to shop a little .
